page.title: 02Where People Work
page.content: Being a rural area many people still find employment on the land,farming and market gardening. A few families earn their living from fishing and the processing of the catch. There are quite a few people, based in the area who are plumbers,builders, joiners and decorators.This work means that they may have to travel to other villages and nearby towns. Tourism is very important in summer, there is a large Caravan site close to Flookburgh which employs local people in the season.A number of houses offer Bed and Breakfast. Nurseries and Market gardens employ up to 50 at peak times, with a similar number in shops and small businesses. Many people now work for large firms in the area...Vickers Shipyard, Glaxo Chemicals, British Gas and Oxleys (Hi- tech).
